All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthnMethod
This interface is an extension point that plugin developers can use to add/override authentication mechanisms exhibited in Casa
BasePerson
Serves as a minimal representation of a user (person) entry in Gluu database directory.
BasicCredential
A POJO holding basic data of an enrolled credential (authentication device).
BrowserInfo
A POJO holding basic information about a user's browser.
Client
 
CredentialRemovalConflict
Enumerates possible hypothetical scenarios that would arise in case a user's credential is dropped.
CustomDateConverter
This class is a custom ZK converter employed to display dates appropriately according to user location.
CustomScript
A basic representation of a Gluu Server custom script.
IBrandingManager
 
IdentityPerson
Extends BasePerson in order to manipulate attributes userPassword and jansExtUid.
IPersistenceService
Provides CRUD access to the underlying persistence engine of your Jans Server installation.
IPluginSettingsHandler<T>
Allows for reading, modifying and saving config data for a plugin in the underlying database.
IPluginSettingsHandlerFactory
 
ISessionContext
An interface providing methods with basic descriptive information about the current user's session.
ITrackable
An interface that can be implemented by plugins in order to exhibit information about plugin usage.
JansOrganization
A basic representation of the directory tree organization entry (see jansOrganization object class of LDAP for instance).This class gives you access to data such as organization name, inum, and manager group.
LocalDirectoryInfo
Provides location information about important entities of Jans Server
LocalDirectoryInfo2
Provides access to extra information in the local database.
MenuType
Enumerates the type of menus that can be extended in Gluu Casa, ie. menus to which items can be added via plugin extensions.
NavigationMenu
A pf4j extension point.
PersonPreferences
 
PreferredMethodFragment
 
ProtectedApi
Annotate a JAX-RS resource method with this annotation to make the endpoint protected.
RSResourceScope
Use this annotation to decorate JAX-RS resources (eg. classes annotated with @jakarta.ws.rs.Path) in order to specify whether the resource should be treated as a singleton or if you want your class be instantiated upon every request.
Scope
 
SndFactorAuthenticationUtils
Contains methods to facilitate certain operations related to strong authentication
UIUtils
Utility class to show auto-dismiss notification success/error ZK notification boxes.
User
A java bean representing an end-user.
Utils
Provides miscellaneous utilities.
WebUtils
Provides utility methods for web-related functionalities.
